title: Local Hour: The Sentence Before “Still”
description:
Mike Ryan is back in town to give us the details on his trip to Buffalo for Bills and Sabres games including chicken wings, league logos, and dildos. Then, Amin helps us break down what's been going wrong with the Miami Heat and how their defense is letting him down. Plus, a word-by-word breakdown of Greg Cote's tweets from over the weekend about the passing of Jerry Lee Lewis.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
